briefdescription.para: This function initializes a timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: Luiz Villa luiz.villa@laas.fr
Clément Foucher clement.foucher@laas.fr
Ayoub Farah Hassan ayoub.farah-hassan@laas.fr

briefdescription.para: This fonction starts both outputs of the selected HRTIM channel.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

briefdescription.para: This function stops both outputs of the selected HRTIM channel.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

briefdescription.para: This function starts only one output of the selected HRTIM channel.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME, PWMF
output to disable - TIMING_OUTPUT1, TIMING_OUTPUT2

briefdescription.para: This function starts only one output of the selected HRTIM channel.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME, PWMF
output to disable - TIMING_OUTPUT1, TIMING_OUTPUT2

briefdescription.para: This function sets the modulation mode for a given PWM unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
PWM Modulation - Lft_aligned or UpDwn

simplesect.para: this function must be called BEFORE initializing the selected timer

briefdescription.para: This function sets the switch convention for a given PWM unit i.e. you decide which one of the output of the timer can be controlled with duty cycle.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
PWM Switch to be driven by the duty cycle. The other will be complementary - PWMx1 or PWMx2

simplesect.para: this function must be called before the timer initialization

briefdescription.para: This function initialize the frequency.

parameterdescription.para: frequency in Hz

simplesect.para: this function must be called BEFORE initialiazing any timing unit. the frequency initialized becomes the MINIMUM possible. use it BEFORE initialization of the timing unit.

briefdescription.para: This functions initialize the frequency and also sets the minimal reachable frequency.

parameterdescription.para: frequency in Hz
desired minimal frequency in Hz

simplesect.para: this function must be called BEFORE initialiazing any timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function sets the dead time for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
rising edge dead time in ns
falling edge dead time in ns

simplesect.para: use this function BEFORE initializing the chosen timer

briefdescription.para: This function sets the duty cycle for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
duty cycle value

briefdescription.para: This function sets the phase shift in respect to timer A for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
phase shift value ° between -360 and 360

simplesect.para: use this function AFTER setting the frequency and initializing the chosen timer

briefdescription.para: This function sets a special pwm mode for voltage or current mode.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
PWM mode - VOLTAGE_MODE or CURRENT_MODE

simplesect.para: this function must be called BEFORE initialiazing the selected timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function returns the PWM mode (voltage or current mode)

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: PWM mode - VOLTAGE_MODE or CURRENT_MODE
this function must be called before initialiazing a timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function sets external event linked to the timing unit essential for the current mode.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
external event trigger - EEV1,EEV2, EEV3, EEV3, EEV4, EEV5, EEV6, EEV7, EEV8, EEV9

simplesect.para: this function must be called before initialiazing a timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function sets the external event linked to the timing unit used for the current mode.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: external event trigger - EEV1,EEV2, EEV3, EEV3, EEV4, EEV5, EEV6, EEV7, EEV8, EEV9

briefdescription.para: This function returns the modulation type of the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: Lft_aligned or UpDwn (center aligned)

briefdescription.para: This function returns the switching convention of the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: PWMx1 (high side convention) or PWMx2 (low-side convention)

briefdescription.para: This function returns the period of the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: the period value in uint16

briefdescription.para: This function sets the PostScaler value for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
post scaler ratio

simplesect.para: this function must be called after initialiazing a timing unit, and before enabling the adc trigger

briefdescription.para: This function sets the adc trigger linked to a timer unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
adc trigger - ADCTRIG_1, ADCTRIG_2, ADCTRIG_3 et ADCTRIG_4

simplesect.para: Call this function BEFORE enabling the adc trigger and AFTER initializing the selected timer

briefdescription.para: This function returns the adc trigger linked to a timer unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: adc trigger - ADCTRIG_1, ADCTRIG_2, ADCTRIG_3 et ADCTRIG_4

briefdescription.para: This function enables the adc trigger for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: call this function only AFTER setting the adc trigger and initializing the chosen timer

briefdescription.para: This function disables the adc trigger for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

briefdescription.para: This function sets the comparator value at which the ADC is trigered.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
a value between 0 and 1

briefdescription.para: This function sets the adc trig rollover mode for the selected timer.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
Rollover mode - EdgeTrigger_up, EdgeTrigger_down, EdgeTrigger_Both

simplesect.para: this function must be called BEFORE initialiazing the selected timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function returns the adc trigger rollover mode for the selected timer.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

simplesect.para: Rollover mode - EdgeTrigger_up, EdgeTrigger_down, EdgeTrigger_Both

briefdescription.para: This function sets the number of event which will be ignored between two events. ie. you divide the number of trigger in a fixed period. For example if decimation = 1, nothing changes but with decimation = 2 you have twice less adc trigger.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF
decimation/post-scaler - a number between 1 and 32

simplesect.para: this function must be called AFTER initialiazing the selected timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function disables the interrupt on repetition counter.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME or TIMF

briefdescription.para: This function sets the repetition counter to ISR period.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME or TIMF
number of repetition before the interruption on repetition counter event

briefdescription.para: This function returns the repetition counter value.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME or TIMF

simplesect.para: repetition counter value

briefdescription.para: This function configures the interrupt on repetition counter.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME or TIMF
number of repetition before the interruption on repetition counter event
function to call each interupt

briefdescription.para: This function enables the interrupt on repetition counter.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME or TIMF

briefdescription.para: This function returns the period in µs of the selected timer.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Unit - PWMA, PWMB, PWMC, PWMD, PWME or PWMF

briefdescription.para: Change the frequency/period after it has been initialized.

parameterdescription.para: The new frequency in Hz

simplesect.para: The new frequency can't be inferior to the the one set in the initialization step Use it AFTER the initialization of the timing unit.

briefdescription.para: Handles all pwm signals for the spin board.

simplesect.para: Use this element to call functions related to the pwm.
